d:
Fan translation of What Happened at the Festival (お祭りのあいまに) by Rainichi
Translation and Typesetting by Benjiboyo (Me)
Cleaning and Decensoring by Anubis-sama
Commissioned by Anonymous
This... took way longer than it needed to be... mostly because I swear, the universe does not want me to finish this... but here we are finally.
Next one should be something other than Rainichi.
JP Scan: TBA
